title: India, US seek stronger global curbs on terror outfits, proxies
description: India and the US have urged stronger curbs on UN-sanctioned terrorist organisations, including tighter global asset freezes and travel bans on their members. They also voiced concern over the growing use of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), drones and artificial intelligence for terrorist activities.

title: Adrien Brody insists AI cannot 'replace emotion'
description: Oscar-winner Adrien Brody claims that artificial intelligence (AI) will never "replace emotion", amid concern about the technology's use in the film industry.
content:
Adrien Brody insists that artificial intelligence (AI) will never "replace emotion".

title: Japan to ease personal info protection to push AI development
description: Japan plans to ease legal restrictions on the use of personal information to accelerate the development of artificial intelligence while penalizing violations, a source familiar with the matter said. title: Data centers rapidly transforming small-town America
description: Demand for artificial intelligence is fueling a digital gold rush across America, and some communities across the U.S. are experiencing the shift in real time.
content:
It’s a digital gold rush as data-center development sweeps through small-town America.
As demand for artificial intelligence, cloud computing and digital storage surges, developers are racing to secure land, power and water.

description: Hyderabad: A 32-year-old research scientist working in the field of artificial intelligence (AI) at a software MNC, lodged a complaint with the Hydera.

title: Apple Rocked By Executive Departures, With Chip Chief At Risk Of Leaving Next
description: Apple Inc., long the model of stability in Silicon Valley, is suddenly undergoing its biggest personnel shake-up in decades, with senior executives and key engineers both hitting the exits. In just the past week, Apple’s heads of artificial intelligence and interface design stepped down. Then the company announced that its general counsel and head of governmental affairs were leaving as well. All four executives have reported directly to Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook

title: Matt Garman Says AI Agents Will Eclipse the Internet at AWS re:Invent 2025
description: At AWS re:Invent 2025, Amazon CEO Matt Garman delivered a sweeping vision for the future of artificial intelligence, arguing that AI agents will ultimately be more transformative than both the Internet and cloud computing. title: Riding the tsunami: Preparing Filipinos for the future of work
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) is not just another buzzword. It is the force that is rapidly reshaping the future of work. For Filipinos, the challenge is no longer about finding that one “dream job” and holding onto it for life. Instead, the question we should be asking ourselves is: Which fast-moving wave am I going to ride?

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - India Invites US Financial Leaders to AI Summit
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
